entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Eskasoni
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:07 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 09:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 3.1°C
Wind: SW 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning then changing to freezing rain in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the morning and dissipating in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
